name: Bob's Quest
description:
Join Bob Ross in his quest to find the perfect wilderness trail. Navigate through the wilderness maze to perfect your painting abilities, find new spells to paint an get better by painting the monsters of the wild.

To walk use WASD and the mouse to guide your camera, during a battle select and paint your spell. The better your painting, stronger your attack will be. To paint your spell click and drag your mouse along the spell guide. But be quick. Every second that you spend painting will consume MP. Try to find all the Seven Spells in the game to stand a chance against the final boss.

 If you find yourself in trouble, press "R" to escape from a battle.
